name: Datasette llm
description: A Datasette CLI utility and Python library for interacting with Large Language Models

name: Datasette
description: Datasette is a tool for exploring and publishing data. It helps people take data of any shape, analyze and explore it, and publish it as an interactive website and accompanying API.

name: Claude
description: Claude is a family of large language models developed by Anthropic.

name: jq
description: jq is a command-line JSON processor. You can transform structured data with the same ease that sed, awk, grep and friends let you play with text.

name: Document Web API
description: The Document interface represents any web page loaded in the browser and serves as an entry point into the web page's content, which is the DOM tree.

name: Python
description: Python is a programming language that lets you work quickly and integrate systems more effectively.

name: Firefox DevTools
description: Firefox Developer Tools is a set of web developer tools built into Firefox. You can use them to examine, edit, and debug HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: curl
description: curl is used in command lines or scripts to transfer data.

name: GitHub Actions
description: GitHub Actions makes it easy to automate all your software workflows, right from GitHub.

name: sqlite-utils
description: Library and command-line utility to help create SQLite databases from an existing collection of data.
